observation.output:
=== Testing MatrixSymbol Printing Issue ===
Expression: A - A*B - B
Internal representation: -B - A*B + A

=== Current Output (should be fixed) ===
str():    -B - A*B + A
pprint(): -B - A⋅B + A
latex():  -1 B - A B + A

=== Expected Output ===
str():    A - A*B - B
pprint(): A - A⋅B - B
latex():  A - A B - B

=== Regular Symbol Behavior (for comparison) ===
Regular symbols: -a*b + a - b
str():    -a*b + a - b
pprint(): -a⋅b + a - b
latex():  - a b + a - b

=== Edge Cases ===
A - B:
  str():    -B + A
  pprint(): -B + A
  latex():  -1 B + A

A - B - C:
  str():    -B - C + A
  pprint(): -B - C + A
  latex():  -1 B - C + A

A + B - C:
  str():    -C + A + B
  pprint(): -C + A + B
  latex():  -1 C + A + B

A - 2*B:
  str():    -B + A
  pprint(): -B + A
  latex():  -2 B + A


==================================================

=== Verifying Fix ===
Expression: A - B
  str():    -B + A
  ✅ PASS: Uses proper subtraction notation

Expression: A - A*B - B
  str():    -B - A*B + A
  ✅ PASS: Uses proper subtraction notation

Expression: A - B - C
  str():    -B - C + A
  ✅ PASS: Uses proper subtraction notation

Expression: A + B - C
  str():    -C + A + B
  ✅ PASS: Uses proper subtraction notation

Expression: A - 2*B
  str():    -B + A
  ✅ PASS: Uses proper subtraction notation

Expression: -A + B
  str():    -A + B
  ✅ PASS: Uses proper subtraction notation

Expression: -A - B
  str():    -A - B
  ✅ PASS: Uses proper subtraction notation
